sessions.title: Registration Starts
sessions.subtitle: Arrive at the venue and get checked in.

sessions.title: Dinner & Networking
sessions.subtitle: Friday pizzas. Meet people, get familiar with each other.

sessions.title: Welcome & Rules
sessions.subtitle: Warm welcome and review agenda for the weekend.

sessions.title: Pitchfire
sessions.subtitle: 60 seconds to present your idea - a mic, your voice and your passion.

sessions.title: Voting
sessions.subtitle: Attendees vote for the top pitches.

sessions.title: Doors Open
sessions.subtitle: Arrive at the venue and get checked in.

sessions.title: Mentors arrive
sessions.subtitle: Mentors help teams one-on-one. They are here to help!

sessions.title: Mentors still here
sessions.subtitle: Mentors are still here to help. Ask questions, show them what you have done.

sessions.title: Tech check
sessions.subtitle: Obligatory tech check for final presentations.

sessions.title: FINAL PRESENTATIONS
sessions.subtitle: 3 min presentation and 3 min Q&A per team.
